holidays.title: All the News That's Fit to Print Day
holidays.description: All the News That’s Fit to Print Day is observed to encourage honest journalism.

holidays.title: Children's Hospice Day
holidays.description: Children's Hospice Day also recognizes the importance of hospices in healthcare. Let’s learn more.

holidays.title: Feast of St. Paul's Shipwreck
holidays.description: Celebrate the event arrival of St. Paul in Malta on this day!

holidays.title: International Cribbage Day
holidays.description: Play cribbage with your friends or family to commemorate International Cribbage Day.

holidays.title: International Winter Bike to Work Day
holidays.description: Get your helmets and gear ready, we are about to go cycling!

holidays.title: National Cream Cheese Brownie Day
holidays.description: Get ready to taste some delicious cream cheese brownies and learn fun facts along the way!

holidays.title: National Flannel Day
holidays.description: Put on your favorite flannel shirts as we dive deeper into the world of flannel.

holidays.title: National Home Warranty Day
holidays.description: Protect your expensive appliances and household apparatuses by getting them covered by a home warranty.

holidays.title: National Julio Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate one of the most iconic names in the world.

holidays.title: National Louis Day
holidays.description: Get ready to honor one of the most unique names in the world.

holidays.title: National Umbrella Day
holidays.description: As part of many cultures since ancient times, umbrellas have a storied history worth commemorating.

holidays.title: Plimsoll Day
holidays.description: Get ready to know why Plimsoll Day is important in the shipping industry!

holidays.title: Scout Sabbath
holidays.description: Put on your uniform and get ready to honor Shabbat with all the information we have!

holidays.title: Teddy Day
holidays.description: Get ready to celebrate Teddy Day in style and put a smile on people’s faces!

holidays.title: Valentismas
holidays.description: Remind yourself of the love that you are surrounded by on Valentismas.

holidays.title: Welsh Language Music Day
holidays.description: Learn more about this style of music and its resurgence in popularity in recent times.

holidays.title: World Pulses Day
holidays.description: Today, we are celebrating healthy, nutritious legumes, and their vast benefits to the environment.

holidays.title: Emily Bustamante’s Birthday
holidays.description: For this stylish and talented mother, there’s nothing she won’t do to follow her passion.
